text.main: Numbers here are indicating the maximum per category which the company is allowed to share based on their privacy policy - which you have accepted when you use their services. This information is based on the privacy policy provided by the company on their German website.
gaugeExplanation.third: Durchschnittlicher Wert aller derzeit verfügbaren Firmeninformationen in dieser Kategorie
gaugeExplanation.fourth: Wert der Firma, die in dieser Kategorie von allen derzeit verfügbaren Firmeninformationen, den höchsten Wert aufweist.
